pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AiiDA (www.aiida.net) is a workflow manager for computational science with a strong focus on provenance, performance and extensibility.## DeprecatedThis metapackage for AiiDA has been deprecated as of v1.0 and is no longer being maintained.If you want to install AiiDA, please install the [`aiida-core` package](https://pypi.org/project/aiida-core/) instead.## AcknowledgementsAiiDA is a [NumFOCUS Affiliated Project](https://www.numfocus.org) and supported by the [MARVEL National Centre of Competence in Research](http://www.marvel-nccr.ch), the [MaX European Centre of Excellence](http://www.max-centre.eu) and by a number of other supporting projects, partners and institutions, whose complete list is available on the [AiiDA website acknowledgements page](http://www.aiida.net/acknowledgements/).
